title: BungeeCord跨服后报错
author: 夏天不太冷
txt_content:
[18:55:23] [User Authenticator #8/WARN]: Couldn't look up profile properties for com.mojang.authlib.GameProfile@65631e2f[id=c0e1425d-11b3-3370-bc9b-77bceb0e3d17,name=dou_luo,properties={},legacy=false]
com.mojang.authlib.exceptions.AuthenticationException: The client has sent too many requests within a certain amount of time
        at com.mojang.authlib.yggdrasil.YggdrasilAuthenticationService.makeRequest(YggdrasilAuthenticationService.java:79) ~[patched_1.14.4.jar:git-Paper-243]
        at com.mojang.authlib.yggdrasil.YggdrasilMinecraftSessionService.fillGameProfile(YggdrasilMinecraftSessionService.java:180) ~[patched_1.14.4.jar:git-Paper-243]
        at com.destroystokyo.paper.profile.PaperMinecraftSessionService.fillGameProfile(PaperMinecraftSessionService.java:37) ~[patched_1.14.4.jar:git-Paper-243]
        at com.mojang.authlib.yggdrasil.YggdrasilMinecraftSessionService.fillProfileProperties(YggdrasilMinecraftSessionService.java:173) ~[patched_1.14.4.jar:git-Paper-243]
        at com.destroystokyo.paper.profile.PaperMinecraftSessionService.fillProfileProperties(PaperMinecraftSessionService.java:30) ~[patched_1.14.4.jar:git-Paper-243]
        at com.destroystokyo.paper.profile.CraftPlayerProfile.complete(CraftPlayerProfile.java:177) ~[patched_1.14.4.jar:git-Paper-243]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_14_R1.LoginListener$LoginHandler.fireEvents(LoginListener.java:313) ~[patched_1.14.4.jar:git-Paper-243]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_14_R1.LoginListener$1.run(LoginListener.java:212) ~[patched_1.14.4.jar:git-Paper-243]
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_231]
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_231]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_231]
0, 818.4553392165159)

replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content:
夏天不太冷 发表于 2020-2-26 19:21
BC端和子端都关了的
关闭子服的bc模式

replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content:
向mojang获取玩家信息的时候失败了
原因:一段时间内发送了太多请求
服务器开的正版验证吗

replies.author: 夏天不太冷
replies.txt_content:
EmptyLava 发表于 2020-2-26 19:17
向mojang获取玩家信息的时候失败了
原因:一段时间内发送了太多请求
服务器开的正版验证吗 ...
BC端和子端都关了的

replies.author: 利姆露酱
replies.txt_content:
EmptyLava 发表于 2020-2-26 19:25
关闭子服的bc模式
不应该打开吗
不开bc模式会造成很多问题

replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content:
雪碧最可爱 发表于 2020-2-26 19:27
不应该打开吗
不开bc模式会造成很多问题
我百度指定mcbbs.net找的答案 xmdhs大佬说的关闭

replies.author: 利姆露酱
replies.txt_content:
EmptyLava 发表于 2020-2-26 19:28
我百度指定mcbbs.net找的答案 xmdhs大佬说的关闭
还行
学到了

replies.author: 夏天不太冷
replies.txt_content: 关闭真的不报错了，不过我看别的教程说要打开，两者有啥区别？
